scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test || SET NODE_ENV=test && mocha --opts test/mocha.opts test/**/**/*.js
scripts.test:unit: export NODE_ENV=test || SET NODE_ENV=test && mocha --opts test/mocha.opts test/unit/**/*.js
scripts.test:integration: export NODE_ENV=test || SET NODE_ENV=test && mocha --opts test/mocha.opts test/integration/**/*.js
